Nice Acne Clear Spot Treatment | Best Spot Treatment for Clear Skin Just Nutritive is JustNaturalSkinCare ['In just a few hours your break-out will disappear and your skin will look as if it was never there! This fast acting acne serum contains all natural ingredients in a potent concentration. Designed to attack acne at its source and kill the bacteria that cause acne and prevent more break-outs.'] {'Package Dimensions': '4.4 x 3.9 x 1.6 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '812326010133', 'Manufacturer': 'Just Natural Products', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'} It works pretty well but does take awhile to heal spots. But i find if i just put it on it tends to work longer and better. It doesnt dry skin out either. These are okay items... The hair bands are really cheap and i just tossed them out. i wish i would have just bought items separately. its okay.... profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Genuine Preferences:** The user has expressed a growing interest in vibrant, user-friendly beauty products, including nail art, skincare, and now body paint solutions that allow for creative self-expression. Their recent purchase indicates a practical application of products for nail care, further emphasizing their focus on multifunctionality.

- **Trends:** 
  - Enjoys blending practicality with aesthetics, prioritizing versatile items that cater to a variety of beauty routines.
  - Values effective, easy-to-use products that integrate seamlessly into their lifestyle, showcasing a commitment to enhancing personal grooming.
  - Maintains a strong emphasis on vibrant colors and effective skincare, seeking results-driven solutions that align with their aesthetic preferences.

- **Behavior Patterns:** 
  - Recently shared a positive experience using a product for its intended purpose, illustrating a resourceful approach to beauty care that maximizes functionality.
  - Continues to express dissatisfaction when products fall short on quality and usability, reinforcing a commitment to reliable, well-designed items.
  - Embraces creativity in their grooming routine by experimenting with simple, stylish methods for self-expression across various beauty areas, now extending into cosplay makeup.

Overall, the user exemplifies a commitment to stylish and functional personal care products that facilitate effortless self-expression while prioritizing quality and usability across their diverse beauty interests. Their recent engagement highlights an enthusiasm for innovative applications within their established beauty practices.
